com.facebook.litho.widget

Class GlyphWarmer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.litho.widget.GlyphWarmer

  • public class GlyphWarmer
extends Object
    A class that schedules a background draw of a Layout. Drawing a Layout in the background ensures that the glyph caches are warmed up and ready for drawing the same Layout on a real Canvas. This will substantially reduce drawing times for big chunks of text. On the other hand over-using text warming might rotate the glyphs cache too quickly and diminish the optimization.

      • warmLayout

        public void warmLayout(Layout layout)
        Schedules a Layout to be drawn in the background. This warms up the Glyph cache for that Layout.
